sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: A fragment containing: the hSyn1 promoter-a (Rox-Stop-Rox) cassette-a FLEX cassette with Lox71/LoxJTZ17 sites flanking (ChR2H134R-EYFP)-WPRE-bGHpA were swapped in to replace the CMV promoter-MCS-hGHpA sequence. Total insert size including the two ITRs is 4439 bp.
